Name: Mik
About the game: GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT definitely not inspired by portal Mik is a dark, fast-paced jump, run and parkour game. Features: -Singelplayer-story! It is a Story about a test subject trying to escape a underground facility in a futuristic world with beautiful models and detailed levels. There is an toturial, the introduction and chapter 1 with 6 levles. Great Movment Sliding,Wallrunning, Jumppads, grappling guns(<--- not in any level yet) -Post Processing Smoooooth main menu/pause menu animations Things that will be added soon: -More Chapters to the story
